codeTracker.googleSheets.spreadSheetId.description: Google Sheets spreadsheet id. You can find if in the url of your google spreadsheet in the web.
codeTracker.googleSheets.spreadSheetId.markdownDescription: Google Sheets spreadsheet id. You can find if in the url of your google spreadsheet in the web.

codeTracker.googleSheets.workSheetTitle.description: Google Sheets worksheet title. You can find it at the bottom of your google worksheet in the web.
codeTracker.googleSheets.workSheetTitle.markdownDescription: Google Sheets worksheet title. You can find it at the bottom of your google worksheet in the web.

codeTracker.googleSheets.clientEmail.description: Google Sheets clientEmail. You can find it in the google developer console or in the json that comes with it.
codeTracker.googleSheets.clientEmail.markdownDescription: Google Sheets clientEmail. You can find it in the google developer console or in the json that comes with it.

codeTracker.googleSheets.privateKey.description: Google Sheets privateKey. You can find it in the google developer console or in the json that comes with it.
codeTracker.googleSheets.privateKey.markdownDescription: Google Sheets privateKey. You can find it in the google developer console or in the json that comes with it.

codeTracker.isDebugMode.description: Debug mode will clear the daily extention sheet.
codeTracker.isDebugMode.markdownDescription: Debug mode will clear the daily extention sheet.

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
